summary: Health Suite S4 Demo Testing Complete. All 17 API tests passed. Frontend UI verified via Playwright - all components render correctly in unauthenticated preview mode.
critical_code_review_comments: Demo page correctly shows 'Demo Preview Mode' when unauthenticated
All 6 module cards render correctly (Patient Registry, Appointments, Visits, Encounters, Prescriptions, Laboratory)
Hero section displays with all 5 badges (S3 API Complete, Capability Guarded, Nigeria-First, VAT Exempt, Cash-Friendly)
Architecture section displays 4 layers (Registry, Scheduling, Clinical, Commerce Boundary)
Commerce Boundary Compliance notice correctly explains billing facts only pattern
Nigeria-First Healthcare Design section shows Clinical Features, Financial Design, Privacy & Compliance
/api/health/demo endpoint correctly returns 401 for unauthenticated requests
All 12 Health API endpoints return 401 for unauthenticated requests (proper auth guards)
seed_data_creation: None - testing unauthenticated preview mode only
context_for_next_testing_agent: Health Suite S4 Demo testing complete. The /health-demo page renders correctly in unauthenticated preview mode showing all module cards, architecture section, and Nigeria-First features. The /api/health/demo endpoint and all Health APIs correctly return 401 for unauthenticated requests. Next testing should focus on authenticated flows with a tenant that has 'health' capability enabled to test demo data seeding functionality.
